definition[0]: equal to 5,10 etc parts out of every 100 parts
example[0]: a one percent  (=1%) cut in interest rates
definition[1]: an amount equal to 5,10 etc parts out of every 100 parts
example[2]: Some of the lenders charge as much as 35 percent.
example[3]: 40 percent of the survey participants expect business to slow down in the next six months.
example[5]: our marketing spending as a percent of sales
